extendedInfo.description: 1941: Axis & Allies is an Android strategy board game based on the conflicts of World War II between the Axis powers (Germany / Japan) and the Allies (Russia / UK / America).This legendary war is carried out over 57 land territories and 48 sea zones, and includes 9 different units like infantry, tanks, bombers and battleships. Conquer the enemy and claim victory by destroying their armies and capturing their capital cities!In digital form 1941: Axis & Allies supports 5 players over two teams, in local pass and play format combined with an advanced AI if desired. Itâs been exclusively designed and developed for Android devices including medium to high end phones and tablets, with crisp graphics and an intuitive touch interface.Awesome features include detailed in-game statistics, full replay capability, automatic game saving, custom sounds and legendary music. If youâre a fan of strategy board games like Age of Conquest, World Conquer or Drisk, donât miss 1941: Axis & Allies!Note that this game is HD and may run out of memory during loading on some older devices, especially those with 512MB of RAM or less, depending on the manufacturer.This is the first release of 1941: Axis & Allies so donât hesitate to contact me directly with any bugs, questions, suggestions or if you just don't like it and want a refund: brian.dewolff@gmail.com

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: This strategy boardgame is as good as it gets. Beautiful graphics and really good interface. The game shows what a perfect platform smartphones are for these type of games.
reviews.author: Lennart Alkn\303\244s

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: I am a big fan of board games, and this is a great rendition of a true classic. Well conceived, easy interface, HD graphics that work well on 10\" tablets and highly entertaining to play. Nice work!
reviews.author: Clarke Forsyth

reviews.title: Great game... but,
reviews.comment: Dice rolls favor the AI heavily, would be nice if rolls were more random, also provide options to choose advantage like the board and PC game. Great design and game play. Loved the board game, and PC game, designer did a great job creating the same experience for Android.
reviews.author: Ed Pokryfky

reviews.title: Fun game if you already know the rules
reviews.comment: The designer did a very good job with this game. The controls are mostly intuitive and the AI is good. If you don\'t already know the rules it may be more challenging to play the first few games.  Well worth the $2.99 price.
reviews.author: Marc Nathan

reviews.title: Excellent UI for a classic title
reviews.comment: This is an extremely well crafted app with an excellent interface. The AI is improving and with multi player on the way it\'s sure to have a great future. Responsive developer with frequent updates.
reviews.author: Trey McLendon

reviews.title: The Best
reviews.comment: I\'ve been waiting for this game  many like it all fall short as much like the original board game as you are gonna find I\'ve tried.
reviews.author: Mass Samm

reviews.title: Excellent and highly addictive!
reviews.comment: AI could do with a further update, but overall this plays a great game on my phone.
reviews.author: Richard Adams

reviews.title: Greatest game on earth!
reviews.comment: Good game. Pretty much just like the actual board game. Would like tho if you made another A&A with 1) more units 2) purchasing of industries 3) bigger map with more territories 4) purchasing of technologies and 5) more nations to play. Would pay $6.99 for that, hands down!
reviews.author: Chris Schwartz

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Really amazing conversion! Wish it had a tutorial available so I could suggest it to friends who haven\'t played the board game before. Also, would punch a horse in the mouth for a chance to play this with other players.
reviews.author: Daniel Christensen

reviews.title: Can\'t go wrong with this developer\'s games!
reviews.comment: I had never played the board game before so for someone new to it, there is a learning curve but once you get passed it and understand the rules, the game is amazing. Graphics are stunning and developer is super quick to answer any questions. I hope he makes more games like this, I will buy them all ... Like the title says .... Can\'t go wrong with Brian\'s games!! Worth every penny!
reviews.author: Luigi Cammilletti

reviews.title: Best stragey game
reviews.comment: Nice game i love it. It will be better if u can put italy as axis too  and also maybe more missions plus more nations. Such as french, Canadian and etc. BTW add  more units called such as light cruiser and heavy cruiser.
reviews.author: David Ng

reviews.title: Graphics are ok. Can\'t really comment on the gameplay, as
reviews.comment: Grapihcs are good, gamplay frustrating though. Even simple games have tutorials, would it have been so hard to include one? Thank goodness I didn\'t actually waste my hard earned money on this or I\'d have been really upset instead if mildly annoyed.
reviews.author: Joey Branum

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Had trouble with the game shutting down on older version of Android. Upgraded to ICS and everything works great. The AI is surprisingly competent. Very nice implementation of the A&A 1941 version of the game. Looking forward to more games from this developer.
reviews.author: Kent Morrison

reviews.title: Issue
reviews.comment: Ill keep it at 3 stars for now since its unable to verify the game from google play citing error 291. I haven\'t been able to get the game going. Hope I can get this fixed. Yes I cleaned the Google play store cache as it asked. Still doesn\'t work. Edit: thanks for the quick reply dev; turns out it was XPrivacy that was blocking the connection. App works and now its time to learn! Thanks again!
reviews.author: Dhruv B

reviews.title: Almost like the real thing.
reviews.comment: Great game for old school and new gamers. Works fine and is fun to play aganist AI. Behaps the combats could be made quicker.
reviews.author: Daniel Mons\303\251n

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: Love this game, just waiting for the multiplayer...
reviews.author: Justin Banks

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: I just want Multiplayer to come out!!! That\'s all I want! Multiplayer should also be balanced. No overpowered side. And your next game, you should make the extended version of this game which i hear is fun. ***And if possible, you should make it to where i could pair any countries i want. I would love to play as Germany and Russia vs. The rest for example. I\'ve already beat the game as every country.***
reviews.author: Victor Figueroa

reviews.title: Fantastic rendition of the board game.
reviews.comment: This is the streamlined, 1941 edition of the board game, so no land bombardments, no options to build new factories and a few other minor rule tweaks. Still easily the best strategy board game on android. It would be nice to have an option to keep playing after the victory conditions are met. Just to really rout the losing forces.
reviews.author: Andy Woolridge

reviews.title: Great/addicting/not easy
reviews.comment: Ai is great including graphics. The ai may be a little too smart. It took a little while to get used  to the controls but it was worth learning. It does take alil while to learn everything. Downside is I think every country should have some value toward points
reviews.author: Jason bic

reviews.title: Nice with room for improvement
reviews.comment: Good: graphics, interface, speed  Bad: no ability to purchase industrial plants, can\'t customize axis/allies/neutral (e.g. usa neutral, Japan allies), AI easy to defeat (i have won 100% of games played), no research (e.g. 1 in 6 chance for research breakthrough w randomized results (super subs...), no anti air units...
reviews.author: Martin M
